name: IRRIDESCENT RED LUSTRE EARRINGS
description:
These exquisite lustre earrings have been designed to give the wearer a look of distinction; they are created using iridescent transparent red glass nuggets wrapped in copper foil and given a silver soldered finish. Because they are iridescent they look great in daylight but sparkle even more in the evening by catching the incandescent light.
The fittings are hypo-allergenic (surgical steel) shepherd hooks which complement these beautiful oval drops.
The oval sizes are approx. 20mm tall by 15mm wide

options.name: one of - please enquire for other colours

name: CONFUSED PUPPY DOG
description:
Who could resist this little puppy with its soppy blue eyes and lazy drooping ears?

Each of my glass pendants and earrings are made with layers of glass for a 3-D effect. These little beauties are fired in my studio kiln, cooled and then annealed to strengthen the glass giving a lovely smooth and polished finish.

The size is approx. 40mm tall by 30mm wide

options.name: 0ne of - other puppies are waiting in their kennels

name: 3D ANTIQUE GLASS BUTTERFLY
description:
Can you imagine this beautiful 3D butterfly landing on your dress! She is quite life like and the photo does not do her justice. This quality butterfly is designed to be worn either as a pendant or can be converted for use as a brooch.

 The choice is yours!

This super butterfly was created  using antique (recycled) amber/yellow glass which was rescued from an 1846 Cornish chapel for her wings and Victorian mirrored glass for her body with an antique patina to finish off which complements the amber/yellow perfectly.

The size is approx 40mm tall by 60mm wide.

options.name: one of - can be made to order - please enquire

name: IRRIDESCENT GREEN CROSS
description:
This stunning cross is made using iridescent green glass nuggets â€“ it shines like oil on water and is created in the Tiffany copper foil style by wrapping each piece in copper foil and joining them together by using solder. It is then finished off by applying an antique patina to give the cross a beautiful and regal look. A perfect Christening present or would make a wonderful confirmation gift.

This quality green irridised cross is approx 8cm tall and 6cm wide and is supplied with a free adjustable round black leather cord or there is an option to choose an Eco non leather cord suitable for vegans - Your Choice! Just let me know.

The size is approx.   80mm tall by 60mm wide

options.name: one of - made to order- please enquire

name: COBALT BLUE OVAL CELTIC GLASS PENDANT
description:
WOW what a statement, this stunning cobalt blue oval glass pendant is a reminder of our rich Celtic past.
It has an antique patinated wire overlay mimicking the shields of our ancient ancestors. Created using a cobalt blue transparent oval glass nugget and wrapped in a Tiffany style copper foil with a wired overlay.
The size is approx.   45mm tall by 55mm wide
